biotools.summary: Visualization tool for displaying loss-of-heterozygosity and/or allelic imbalance (LOH/AI) by making use of VCF files originating from primarily diagnostic panels, although it works on any input.

bioschemas.name: SNPitty
bioschemas.summary: Visualization tool for displaying loss-of-heterozygosity and/or allelic imbalance (LOH/AI) by making use of VCF files originating from primarily diagnostic panels, although it works on any input.
